column4: If I get this error when dpkg-builpackaginng: dpkg-gencontrol: error: must specify package since control info has many - what should I edit?
ur control file
what in it?
there are plenty of debian pkging resources on the net plz read up first
sure, I have, just wondered if someone would have had a quick answer
plz read if no luck come back and ill try to answer
could not find out what was causing this, my debian/control file is just as it should be.
paste in pastebin
sure, Ill need to recompile it first, to get the error again..

it actually compiles when I commented out the other package from the control file (bmpx-dev), any ideas what I should change to get them both compiled? dpkg-gencontrol: error: must specify package since control info has many. - Was the error..
paste ur control file in pastebin
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/25179/
iirc u need only one package line for the bianry, u may need to create a sep pkg to create the -dev lib
well when I compile beryl-core, I get beryl beryl-core and beryl-dev, so it should be possible..
sry i wont be able to help with that, i would compare ur control file for this to that of beryl-core and see wat is different and try to eliminate the differences
just a sec then
here's the beryl-core one http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/25182/
1st thing to try is the spacing, between the end of description and next package tag
the parser may distinguish pkgs based on spacing
ok, trying it now
thanks, it actually worked. the space was needed
np i recall the parser for the control file not being very intelligent
